text: The canton of Hénin-Beaumont-2 is an administrative division of the Pas-de- Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Hénin- Beaumont.Décret n° 2014-233 du 24 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Pas-de-Calais It consists of the following communes: #Courcelles-lès-Lens #Drocourt #Évin-Malmaison #Hénin-Beaumont (partly) #Leforest #Noyelles-Godault ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas- de-Calais
title: Canton of Hénin-Beaumont-2
